comments.body: With TopicPartition changes, expectedReplicasPerTopicAndPartition  Map iteration order changed. Hence this change. System test is passing.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +56,60 @@    // If you change this assertion, you should verify that the replica_verification_test.py system test still passes
    assertTrue(s"Max lag information should be in output: `$output`",
      output.endsWith(": max lag is 10 for partition a-1 at offset 10 among 3 partitions"))
  }
